body:
(I know this has been discussed before, but a quick search doesn't find
it. Forgive the repetition.)

I have here LBNL Window 5a output describing the optical properties of
a glazing system. Can I use this with Radiance & if so, how? Are there
any docs which I can read?
--
Randolph M. Fritz ? RFritz@lbl.gov
Environmental Energy Technologies Division ? Lawrence Berkeley Labs
subject: [Radiance-general] Window Data
